A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sincerely\, I don't understand why people expect the best movie ever out of the Star Wars franchise. The movies are good\, but people can't be let down when they expect huge greatness. \"Star Wars: The Last Jedi\" is a good movie\, period\, but it's not the best of the new trilogy. Some new and old characters could be completely excluded because they could make the movie more organised and focused\, instead of swollen and drawn. But Rey\, Luke\, Leia\, Kylo Ren\, BB-8\, R2-D2\, C-3PO\, Finn and Poe are good once again! Star Wars stays great as it is!
